contentrichtext.text: '''Knowledge Web''' is the name of four different projects: * The [[KnowledgeWeb Project|Knowledge Web Project]] supervised by [[James Burke (science historian)|James Burke]] * A project under the European [[FP6|Sixth Framework Program]] * An example of a knowledge web software platform is the [[Jumper 2.0]] open source project * The Knowledge Web created by AFAC (Australasian Fire and Emergency Service Authorities Council previously [[Australasian Fire Authorities Council]]) for collaboration on Fire and Emergency Services for Australasia {{disambig}}
